name: Diona
quote: Diona, Bartender of the Cat's Tail! I charge a hefty fee for private events... huh? You didn't come here for a drink?
description: The incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern, rising star of Mondstadt's wine industry, and the greatest challenger to its traditional powerhouses. A feisty feline young lady from Springvale, any drink mixed by Diona's hand tastes delicious beyond belief. Yet given her extreme distaste for alcohol, is her talent a blessing or a curse?
